name: yanwari-message
description: やんわり伝言サービス - AI を使って気まずい用件を優しく伝えるサービス

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 PORT=8080 go run main.go
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o bin/server main.go
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && go mod download && go mod tidy
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env || echo 'backend/.env already exists'
scripts.test-env:reset: npm run db:reset && npm run db:seed:full
scripts.test-env:full: firebase emulators:start --only auth & sleep 3 && npm run test-env:reset && npm run test:firebase-integration
scripts.dev:with-emulator: concurrently "firebase emulators:start --only auth" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:status: echo '=== ポート使用状況 ===' && (lsof -i:5173 -i:8080 -i:9099 | head -1 && (lsof -i:5173 -i:8080 -i:9099 | grep -v COMMAND || echo '使用中のポートはありません')) && echo '' && echo '=== Firebase Emulator ===' && (ps aux | grep firebase | grep -v grep || echo 'Firebase Emulator は起動していません')

author: Yanwari Message Team
